typeDescription.name: rs_bs.beliefstate.BeliefStateObject
typeDescription.description: Data from the internal belief state that corresponds to an object hypothesis

featureDescription.name: simulationActorId
featureDescription.description: This is the ID that the simulation engine uses internally to represent the object.

featureDescription.name: rsObjectId
featureDescription.description: This is the ID we assigned to the object in the simulator. rsObjectId is usually not equal to simulationActorId

featureDescription.name: mask_color_r
featureDescription.description: Red Color of this object in the object mask

featureDescription.name: mask_color_g
featureDescription.description: Green Color of this object in the object mask

featureDescription.name: mask_color_b
featureDescription.description: Blue Color of this object in the object mask
